---
category: news
title: "BMW deepens AWS partnership, will move autonomous vehicle data to the cloud"
excerpt: "German automaker BMW plans to keep data from its autonomous and assisted vehicle efforts on Amazon Web Services' (AWS') cloud platform. Building on an existing cloud deal, BMW will store and process data from its next-generation advanced driver-assist system (ADAS) on AWS in a preferred cloud deal."
